name: Island Boy Impact: 3D Action Adventure Mobile Platformer
name_original: Island Boy Impact: 3D Action Adventure Mobile Platformer
description:
Island Boy Impact : 3D Action Adventure Mobile Platformer

Island Boy Impact is a 3D Action Platformer on Android. Attack, Flee, Jump, Run and Increase your power as you explore beautiful handcrafted 3D levels within this mixed action adventure Platformer.

Discover this magical and intense adventure as you fight your way through hordes of evil creatures and traps.
